Testing separability matrix for nested CompoundModels
============================================================
1. Creating simple compound model: cm = Linear1D(10) & Linear1D(5)
   cm.n_inputs = 2, cm.n_outputs = 2

2. Testing separability matrix for simple compound model:
   separability_matrix(cm) =
   [[ True False]
 [False  True]]
   Expected: diagonal matrix [[True, False], [False, True]]
   ✓ PASS: Simple compound model separability is correct

3. Creating complex compound model: Pix2Sky_TAN() & Linear1D(10) & Linear1D(5)
   complex_cm.n_inputs = 4, complex_cm.n_outputs = 4

4. Testing separability matrix for complex compound model:
   separability_matrix(complex_cm) =
   [[ True  True False False]
 [ True  True False False]
 [False False  True False]
 [False False False  True]]
   Expected:
   [[ True  True False False]
 [ True  True False False]
 [False False  True False]
 [False False False  True]]
   ✓ PASS: Complex compound model separability is correct

5. Creating nested compound model: Pix2Sky_TAN() & cm
   nested_cm.n_inputs = 4, nested_cm.n_outputs = 4

6. Testing separability matrix for nested compound model:
   separability_matrix(nested_cm) =
   [[ True  True False False]
 [ True  True False False]
 [False False  True  True]
 [False False  True  True]]
   Expected (should be same as complex_cm):
   [[ True  True False False]
 [ True  True False False]
 [False False  True False]
 [False False False  True]]
   ✗ FAIL: Nested compound model separability is incorrect
   This is the BUG we need to fix!

============================================================
Test completed.
